root.name: Star Wars Jedi Knight II: Jedi Outcast
root.description:
Jedi Outcast puts the player into combat wielding a variety of firearms from the universe, as well as lightsabers and Force powers. The player can choose perspective for every weapon, including the lightsaber .
The player controls Kyle Katarn, a former Jedi who cut his link with The Force after almost succumbing to the Dark Side.
